title: Pedro Castillo inauguration: From rural schoolteacher to Peru's presidency
content:
1. Pedro Castillo inauguration: From rural schoolteacher to Peru's presidency  The Washington Post
  2. Pedro Castillo: The primary school teacher who became Peru's president  BBC News
  3. Peru's new president Pedro Castillo sworn in  Al Jazeera English
  4. Leftwing rural teacher Pedro Castillo sworn in as president of Peru  The Guardian
  5. "It is difficult to express the high honour I feel at this moment"  TeleSUR English
